Plot: The film adaption of James Franco's popular novel Actors Anonymous, exploring the lives of young actors in Hollywood, from the highs to the lows, to the lies and the heartbreak.
Title: Actors Anonymous
Writer: Emily Bensinger, Elizabeth Eccher, Nathan Ellis, James Franco (novel), Matthew Halla, Sam Icklow, Kaela Rae Jensen, Josh Litman, Theodore Martland, Alex Parslow, Stephanie Sandoval, Osahon Tongo
Director: Melanie Aitkenhead, Abi Damaris Corbin, Shaun Duffy, Julio Vincent Gambuto, Justin S. Lee, Kelly Luu, Kevin Luu, Jess Maldaner, Leandro Tadashi, Juel Taylor, Julian Wolff, Kerry Yang
Actors: James Franco, Eric Roberts, Whoopi Goldberg, Emma Rigby
